hero.title: Kamalo City – Intliziyo ye-Afrika eKapa
hero.subtitle: Incasa ye-Afrika. Ibali kwisiqwenga ngasinye.
hero.description: Fumana ukutya kwenene kwe-Afrika, imifuno yemveli, i-hookah ephezulu, ukuhonjiswa, kunye nolonwabo lwempelaveki — konke phantsi kophahla olunye eGoodwood, eKapa.
hero.hours: Kuvuliwe iintsuku ezi-7 ngeveki: 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM

story.title: Ibali Lethu: Ukusuka Kumabhodlo Ukuya Kwisigqi
story.description1: I-Kamalo City yaqala ngo-2023 njengeziko lenkcubeko apho ilifa le-Afrika lidibana nencasa engalibalekiyo. Namhlanje, yenye yezona ndawo zokutya zithandwayo eKapa.
story.description2: Into eyayikade ingamabhodlo yakhiwe ngenjongo — ukudala indawo eshushu yokutya, umculo, kunye nomoya woluntu ohlonipha okhokho bethu kwisitya ngasinye esisiphakayo.
story.point1: Ukusuka kumabhodlo ukuya ekuvuseleleni — Yasekwa ngo-2023 ngombono nokuzimisela
story.point2: Iincasa zokwenene ze-Afrika — Amava anamhlanje neeresiphi zemveli
story.point3: Iziko elifleleyo lenkcubeko — Ukutya, umculo, imisitho, kunye neenkonzo zobomi
story.quote: Ukusuka kumabhodlo ukuya kwisigqi: yavuselelwa ngo-2023, namhlanje i-Kamalo City ibetha ngencasa, uluntu nomphefumlo.

timeline.title: Uhambo Lwethu
timeline.description: Ukusuka embonweni ukuya kwinyani, fumana amanyathelo awakha i-Kamalo City.

2023.title: Yakhiwa Kwakhona Yaza Yavulwa
2023.description: Ukusuka kwindawo eyalahlwayo ukuya kwindawo eshushu yenkcubeko — i-Kamalo City yavula iingcango zayo ngombono wokutya kwenene kwe-Afrika.

2024.title: Yaqalisa Imisitho Nolonwabo Oluphilayo
2024.description: Yandiswa ngolonwabo lwempelaveki, ukuququzelela imisitho yabucala, kunye neenkonzo zobomi ezongezelelweyo kubandakanya isaluni yezinwele ne-hookah.

2025.title: Yaba Yindawo Ephambili
2025.description: Yasekwa njengeyona ndawo iphambili yokutya nolonwabo lwe-Afrika eKapa, ethandwa ngabantu basekuhlaleni nabatyeleli.

services.title: Ngaphezulu Kokutya Nje
services.description: Fumana amava apheleleyo e-Kamalo City ngolonwabo, imisitho, kunye neenkonzo zobomi

liveEntertainment.title: Ulonwabo Oluphilayo
liveEntertainment.description: Ubusuku bomculo, ii-DJ, kunye nemiboniso yenkcubeko ngoLwesihlanu noMgqibelo

privateBookings.title: Ukubhuka Kwabucala
privateBookings.description: Ukuqesha indawo iyonke kwiminyhadala, imisitho yeshishini, kunye nemibhiyozo ukuya kwiindwendwe ezingama-80

preOrders.title: Ukuodola Kwangaphambili Nokusebenzela
preOrders.description: Odola kwangaphambili ukuze uzokuthatha okanye wonwabele amava ethu okutya apheleleyo kunye nokhetho lokusebenzela

lifestyle.title: Iinkonzo Zobomi
lifestyle.description: Isaluni ye-hookah ephezulu, iziqholo eziphawulekayo, isaluni yezinwele yobuchwephesha, kunye nobusuku bemidlalo

menu.title: Izitya Eziphawulekayo
menu.description: Fumana izitya zethu ze-Afrika ezithandwa kakhulu, ezenziwe ngeencasa zokwenene kunye neeresiphi zemveli

pricing.title: Ulwazi Lwamaxabiso eMenyu
pricing.dailySpecials: Zonke Izitya Zosuku zi-R80 ne-pap okanye R80 ne-rayisi
pricing.note: *Qaphela: Amaxabiso endlini ahlukile kumaxabiso e-Uber Eats.

testimonials.title: Into Abakuthi Abathengi Bethu
testimonials.description: Amava okwenene avela kwiindwendwe zethu ezixabisekileyo

gallery.title: Igalari Yethu
gallery.description: Hlola ihlabathi elishushu le-Kamalo City ngengqokelela yethu yamaxesha, ukusuka ekutyeni okumnandi ukuya kwimisitho eshushu kunye neenkonzo eziphezulu.
gallery.experienceDescription: Ukulungele ukudala iinkumbulo zakho? Ndwendwela ukuze ufumane ukutya kwenene kwe-Afrika nolonwabo.

faq.title: Imibuzo Ebuzwa Rhoqo
faq.description: Yonke into ekufuneka uyazi ngamava akho e-Kamalo City

footer.description: Apho ilifa elinotyebi le-Afrika lidibana nencasa engalibalekiyo. Woza ngencasa — hlala ngenxa yomoya.
footer.tagline: Nokuba ulapha ukuze udle, uphumle, okanye ubhiyozele — i-Kamalo City yindawo apho lonke ixesha liba yinkumbulo.

reservations.title: Bhuka Amava Akho
reservations.description: Ukhangela indawo efanelekileyo eKapa? I-Kamalo City inika izidlo zabucala, iipati zokuzalwa, imisitho yeshishini, nokunye. Wonwabele ukutya kwenene, imeko eshushu, kunye nenkonzo ebalaseleyo.
reservations.openHours: Kuvuliwe: 11:00 AM ukuya ku-11:00 PM, iintsuku ezi-7 ngeveki
reservations.successMessage: Isicelo sokubhuka sithunyelwe! Siya kuqinisekisa kwiiyure ezi-2.
reservations.confirmationNote: Siya kuqinisekisa ukubhuka kwakho kwiiyure ezi-2. Ukubhuka okukhawulezayo, sitsalele ngqo.
reservations.contactDescription: Qhagamshelana nathi ngoku ukuze ukhuseleke itafile yakho okanye uxoxe ngokhetho lwemisitho yabucala.
reservations.specialRequirementsNote: Ngeemfuno ezikhethekileyo okanye amaqela amakhulu, nceda utsalele

about.title: Ilifa Elinikwe Ubomi
about.description: I-Kamalo City yazalwa kumabhodlo yaza yakhiwa ngenjongo. Ukusuka ngo-2023, sikhule saba yindawo yokutya, umculo, nomoya woluntu.
about.foundersDescription1: Kuzalwe kukuthanda ukuzisa iincasa zokhokho entliziyweni yeKapa, i-Kamalo City idibanisa ukutya kwenene kwe-Afrika namava anamhlanje oluntu. Sisebenza njengeziko lenkcubeko — apho abantu badibana, baphumle, baze bonwabele ubomi.
about.foundersDescription2: I-Kamalo City yasekwa nguPitchou Ntumba nomfazi wakhe, abadala bendawo ephambili yokutya nolonwabo lwe-Afrika eKapa. Umbono wabo odityanisiweyo nobuchule babo ekwamkeleni iindwendwe buguqule le ndawo yaba ngumbhiyozo oshushu wokutya nenkcubeko ye-Afrika.
about.foundersDescription3: Phantsi kobunkokeli babo, i-Kamalo City ikhule yangaphezulu kwendlu yokutya nje — yiziko lenkcubeko apho abantu badibana ukuze bonwabele ukutya kwenene kwe-Afrika, amava e-shisha aphezulu, iinkonzo zokuzilungisa zobuchwephesha, nolonwabo.
about.ctaDescription: Ukulungele ukuba yinxalenye yamava e-Kamalo City? Ndwendwela uze ungcamle uthando kwisitya ngasinye.

contact.title: Masiqhagamshelane
contact.description: Ufuna izikhombisi? Ufuna ukwenza ukubhuka? Silapha ukunceda — qhagamshelana nathi nangaliphi na ixesha.
contact.visitDescription: Yenza ukubhuka okanye nje weze ukuze ufumane amava okutya kwenene kwe-Afrika eKapa.
